import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { StoreContext } from '../Context/store'; import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; const CodeReviewer = () => { const { state } = useContext(StoreContext); const { completedTasks } = state; return ( <> {completedTasks.map((task) => ( ))}
Task Name Pull Request Link
{task.taskName} {task.pullRequestLink}
); }; export default CodeReviewer;
